original_title: One Hour Yoga for Weight Loss: Cardio Burn With Julia Marie
overview: Join Yoga instructor Julia Marie in this 1-hour cardio burn Yoga for Weight Loss flow. This instructional video will take you on a beautiful journey to accomplishing your weight loss goals. This class is beneficial for beginners to advanced yogis!
tagline: A 1 Hour Cardio Burn Yoga Workout that will be leaving you wanting more and doing the class again!
title: One Hour Yoga for Weight Loss: Cardio Burn With Julia Marie
